labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: You cannot escape, the screen shakes and the pop-up becomes red
data.short_description: Can escape with the Esc key even when server settings are not saved and the pop-up is supposed to block you
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings - Change anything to bring the unsaved changes pop-up - Hit the Esc key
